title: Abbasi pays tribute to Pakistan army for foiling terrorist plot in Mir Ali
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 17 (APP): Federal Minister for Railways Muhammad Hanif Abbasi Friday lauded the Pakistan army for successfully thwarting the nefarious designs of terrorists in Mir Ali.
Commending the professional excellence and timely action of the security forces, the minister said that the brave soldiers once again demonstrated exceptional skill and dedication in safeguarding the nation.
Hanif Abbasi said that during the swift operation, four terrorists were eliminated, preventing a major threat to national security.
“The entire nation is proud of the courage and sacrifices of our armed forces,” the minister said.
